name: Miyuki Tanaka
routine: Miyuki sleeps by 9pm and wakes up at 5am to meditate and practice tai chi.
occupation: Miyuki is a tea ceremony master in Kyoto, teaching classes from 10am to 4pm.
thoughts: Miyuki is looking forward to her daughter visiting from Tokyo next week, planning to host a special family tea ceremony.
lifestyle: Miyuki lives a minimalist lifestyle, enjoys traditional Japanese meals, and takes pride in her Zen garden, which she tends to daily.

name: Ethan Taylor
routine: Ethan usually sleeps by 12 am and gets up at 6:30 am to get his children ready for school.
occupation: Ethan Taylor is a software developer in a leading tech company, with a focus on developing educational software.
thoughts: Ethan recently considered homeschooling his kids due to his dissatisfaction with the local education system and was researching curricula on 2024-02-04.
lifestyle: Ethan enjoys family movie nights, barbecuing on weekends, and is a hobbyist photographer.
